name: HogwartsSoothingAmbientMusic-Relaxation
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hogwarts music
des:
The audio skill consists of 4 audios. Namely:
1. Ambience Sounds Hogwarts
2. Hogwarts sound for relaxation
3. Rainy Night at Hogwarts
4. Hogwarts sounds for ambience and study/relaxation


You can play/pause/stop resume as like an audio player. 

To start you can say, Alexa, open Hogwarts music and it will prompt you whether you wanna start, for that you can say, start or begin. The conversation for the first time user is :

User: Alexa, open Hogwarts music.
Alexa: Welcome to Hogwarts music. To start you can say start or begin.
User: begin
Alexa: Plays the audio.

For recurrent users,
User: Alexa, open Hogwarts music
Alexa: Do you want to resume, say yes or no, you were listening to <title>
User: Yes
Alexa: <Plays the audio where you left off>

Thank you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
